content: SALES THREAD for the the "Alpen Coin 500,000 Satoshi Silver Plated Bar" Denomination: 0.005 BTCMaterial: Silver Plated AlloyDimensions: 40 x 80 mmThickness: 6 mmWeight: 150 gThe bar comes in a box and with a CoA. Price: 90 CHF  + 0.005 BTCShipping cost:US:1 bar : 25 CHF 2 bars: 36 CHF3 bars: 44 CHF EU: 1 bar: 22 CHF2 bars: 28 CHF3 bars: 44 CHFCH:1 bar: 3,4 CHF2 bars and +: 7 CHF PAYMENT ADDRESS: dmWatch out for scammers. I will never contact you on telegram. If you have any doubt, write on the thread or email me (info@alpencoin.ch)Don't click on DM's Links referring to this thread.                                                                                                                             IF interested you can DM me, write an email to info@alpencoin.ch or comment below.Send me your shipping details + the tx id. (you can use privnote).No Refund.GIVE ME TIME TO SHIP OUT ALL ORDERS AND ANSWER YOUR MESSAGES. I WORK FULL TIME SO IM PRETTY BUSY.Thank you.
